div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1359 Çesme (anc. Erythrae), Ionia, c. 1960 Burial: c. 70-65 B.C. (Kleiner) Contents: 38+ AR Lysimachus: 1 tetradr. (Byzantium) Athens: 14 New Style tetradr. Imit. Athens: 2 tetradr. (Ο ΔΕΜΟΣ) Mithradates VI: 1 tetradr. Nicomedes II: 1 tetradr. Pergamum: 4 cistophori (80-67 B.C.) Chios: 15 dr. Disposition: Boston 38 Thompson, Athens, p. 448, note 1 To be published by F. Kleiner
